zone.line: It justifies that bold & true word
of Tasso: Non merita nome di
creatore sennon Iddio ed il
Poeta.
A Poet as he is the author to
pleasure
others of the highest wisdom pleasure
& glory
virtue, so he ought personally
to be the happiest, the best, the
most the wisest & the most illustrious
of men. As to his glory, let
Time be challenged to declare whether
the fame of any other institutor
of human life be comparable to
that of a poet. That he is the
wisest the happiest & the best, inasmuch
-much as he is a poet, is equally
incontrovertible: the greatest Poets
have always been men of the most
spotless virtue of the most consummate
prudence, &, if we could look into
